name: Lucky Time!!
description:
Lucky Time is a scratch game for funny. It is easy, free and fun to play!
If you are lucky enough, you will love this game!

Feature on Lucky Time:
-Happy scratch scratch, instant rewards.
-Get fun and Prizes in Lucky Time with good luck.
-Invite your friends to join this lucky life.

In Lucky Time, you just need to spend your free time to tap your phone, and match to win endless fun and fortune in the process of playing! lucky can happen every day!

What are you waiting for? Just Download and Reach Lucky Time The more you scratch, the more coinout you can get in your lucky life!

*Apple Inc. does not sponsor, nor in any way affiliated with Lucky Time and/or the sweepstakes prizes.

*This game doesn't cost any real money.
